= Perform a static check =

The CheckHost does this continously.
This is taken care of by the BOINC client and the [Application].
  # Download a work package from the CentralHost.
  # Start the work package:
    # Download the appropriate tool
    # Download the source from the project source repository
  # Run the tool
  # Upload the result.
  # The CentralHost enters the result in a database.

The result could also be uploaded to some project repository for published result.
